files.patch:
@@ -41,1 +41,0 @@
-// Disable -Wdangling-pointer which is introduced in GCC 12.
@@ -43,0 +42,1 @@
+// Disable -Wdangling-pointer which is introduced in GCC 12.
@@ -44,0 +44,3 @@
+
+// Disable -Winfinite-recursion which is introduced in GCC 12.
+#define PRAGMA_INFINITE_RECURSION_IGNORED PRAGMA_DISABLE_GCC_WARNING("-Winfinite-recursion")
